content:
Lithuania President Hitanas Naudedea said he would meet with French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris to discuss ways of accelerating support for Ukraine.

About this Lithuanian PresidentwroteIn his Twitter.

“On the way to Paris to meet with Emmanuel Macron. We will discuss how we can strengthen the safety of NATO's eastern flank, accelerate Ukraine's support and strengthen our defense industry.

The crucial moment for European leadership! ” - It is in the post.

As reported by the Armyinform, to UkrainearrivedAnother party of artillery shells from Lithuania.
title: Presidents of Lithuania and France in Paris will discuss ways to accelerate Ukraine's support
